'''Paul W. Martin''' is the designer of the trivial quiz game [[Tolkien Trivia (video game)|Tolkien Trivia]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/trivia.html Tolkien Trivia] at Tolkien Games</ref><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 1 April 2011)</ref>
